description: This file defines functions for interacting with notification-related API endpoints, specifically a function to list notifications with pagination support.

methods.name: listNotifications({ token, unreadOnly, limit, offset })
methods.description: Fetches a list of notifications from the API with optional filtering for unread notifications, limit, and offset.

ctags.name: listNotifications
